DOC.brief_summary: Malnutrition pregnancy common poor woman develop world due inadequate dietary intake combine increase nutrient requirement ; pregnancy risk consequential among demographic group increase risk maternal infant mortality lifelong effect fetal malnutrition . The benefit treat moderate malnutrition pregnancy remain largely undocumented . This study test hypothesis provide either fortified flour fortify paste-based supplementary food design replete nutrient deficit pregnancy result improve maternal nutritional recovery rate higher infant birth weight length . This study randomize , control clinical trial 3 supplementary food 1800 moderately malnourished Malawian woman pregnant . Subjects receive one 3 food ration : 1 ) ready-to-use supplementary food formulate deliver 200 % recommend daily allowance ( RDA ) micronutrient pregnancy ( RUSF-P ) , 2 ) corn soy blend multiple micronutrient tablet choose deliver 200 % RDA micronutrient ( CSB-P ) 3 ) , standard care corn soy blend supplementary iron folic acid ( CSB ) , deliver 0-350 % RDA . Subjects receive supplementary food recover MAM . The outcome pregnancy maternal nutritional status follow 3 month delivery .
